Get Block Information by Height or Hash

Source: R/near_get_block.R
near_get_block.Rd

Get Block Information by Height or Hash

Usage

near_get_block(block_id = "final")

Arguments

block_id

Block height (integer), hash (character), or "final" (latest finalized).

Value

A tibble with block header and chunk info.

See also

https://docs.near.org/api/rpc/blocks

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
near_get_block("final")
near_get_block(123456789)
near_get_block("8Yd8...abc")
} # }
